alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:54PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SUFFOLK COUNTY THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 854 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rocky Point, or near Middle Island, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manorville, Middle Island, Wading River, Calverton, and Brookhaven National Laboratory around 900 PM EDT. Center Moriches around 910 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Miller Place, East Moriches, Sound Beach, Shoreham, and Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk
